wired.title: Why I Can't Stop Watching Horrifying ISIS Decapitation Videos
wired.topComment: The argument that we need to watch this material in order to witness the evil of ISIS is absurd. By that argument, we should all be watching child porn in order to convince ourselves that child molesters are worth punishing. Let the dead RIP! The vid...

wired.title: How Snow Can Cripple Boston's Subway Cars
wired.topComment: This could be very embarrassing to the author of this article. The Red Line train shown in the photo is made up with cars from the MBTA's 01800 series. These cars were delivered in the early 1990's and were the first MBTA cars to use AC PROPULSION.
